message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $95.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to consider it, but I think I can do better. I'm willing to offer it to you for $98.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to counteroffer at $96.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $96. I'm willing to offer it to you for $99.
I understand, Alice. My final counteroffer is $97.
Bob, I'm getting close to accepting your offer, but I still need to make a little more profit. I'm willing to offer it to you for $101.
Thank you for considering my offers, Alice. I am willing to pay $100 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go below $105. I'm willing to offer it to you for $105.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $103 for the product.
